We use our investment management expertise to help people achieve a lifetime of financial security.Voting Report: Aegon Investment Management B.V. (Netherlands)
Charts on this page show voting in 2018 by Aegon Investment Management B.V. (Aegon Asset Management's entity in the 
Netherlands). Charts on this page cover all meetings and votes cast; charts on page 39 cover those in the Netherlands only.
